title: Twitter’s convinced they’ve found Lasizwe’s doppelganger
text:
Twitter’s convinced they’ve found Lasizwe’s doppelganger share this

On Monday, the Twitterverse exploded after Nomsa Maqethukuma updated her profile picture. Her picture was retweeted as tweeps thought she looks like popular vlogger, Lasizwe.

And even Lasizwe himself acknowledged that he could have a twin by retweeting a side by side picture of him and Nomsa and then saying he needed to speak to his father.

"I need to call my dad,"he wrote before posting another picture of the two and asking people to retweet if they thought they really looked alike.

Here are some of the reactions to Lasizwe finding a female version of himself:
description: Media personality Lasizwe has a doppelganger  and… it’s a woman .
